extendedInfo.description: Get this app for free! At ConstructionKnowledge.net, our resource for learning about construction, sign up for the newsletter or like us on Facebook. Then shoot us an email so we can refund your purchase.Steel Shapes for Construction:Find the design properties for your hot rolled steel shapes for construction & building (US only):Schematic, dimensions, area, Section modulus Sx & Sy, and Moment of Inertia Ix & Iy.Exhaustive library of shapes:W, M, S, HP, C, MC, angle, double angle, HSS round, pipe, HSS rectangle, WT, MT, ST for US hot rolled shapes. For each category, the app contains the information on the dozens or hundreds of  steel sizes.ConstructionKnowledge.net:These apps our part of our mission at ConstructionKnowledge.net to help those in construction to learn and rise in this crazy world of construction. Please send us your ideas for apps, suggestions for new web content and follow our blog. It's Ned's fun and informative take on the construction industry.

reviews.comment: Nice, handy. I wish it included plate, bar and rod though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updates needed
reviews.comment: Needs moment of inertia and hss properties are not correct.

reviews.title: HTC Inspire
reviews.comment: I agree that this app needs to include plate, bar and rod info. Please add this to this app. Thanks.

reviews.comment: Love the application! Would be really good to have a metric list/selection update. Waiting for the British Steel version too!
